game.title: Capture the Flag

long_description:
This for [CTF by Rubenwardy](https://ctf.rubenwardy.com/) ONLY.

### You need to add the mod to secure.http_mods in Minetest.

There are also notifications where you can be notified of CTF maps and modes.

### To Do:

1. Add images of CTF maps in the formspec.
